title: Computer Repair Engineer & Sales Assistant
description: Starting on a Bridgeport manual mill, I spent several years progressing through the workshop, learning to program in G-code and operate CNC machines. After gaining good experience milling and wiring, I joined the drawing office and began producing drawings for the machinery we manufactured.
roles: Production of piece parts from various metals and plastics using 3-axis milling machines and 4-axis wire EDM machines.
Production of detail drawings to BS:8888 suitable for part manufacture.
achievements: Learnt to produce detail and assembly drawings to BS:8888 standard.
Learnt to operate, setup, and program Fanuc CNC 4-axis wire EDM machines.
Learnt to operate, setup, and program Fanuc CNC 3-axis milling machines.
Upgrade and modernisation of the IT infrastructure within the company, improving reliability and data protection.
